citations.narrative:
At time of inspection approximately ten out of fifty dogs were exhibiting matting of the hair coat. Seven female Poodles
(9920000000189923, 9920000000189928, 9920000000172839, 9920000000189974, 9920000000948372,
9920000000162739, 9410002207384) and three male poodles . The matting ranges from small and pendulous, mostly
around the chest and neck area, to medium sized matting diffused on the hind legs and flank area. Matted hair can cause
discomfort and possible skin problems. The licensee should review the facilities program of veterinary care as to how to
maintain and ensure healthy and unmatted hair coats.
To be corrected by: 10.4.2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(4) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
At time of inspection approximately ten out of fifty dogs were exhibiting matting of the hair coat. Seven female Poodles 
(9920000000189923, 9920000000189928, 9920000000172839, 9920000000189974, 9920000000948372, 
9920000000162739, 9410002207384) and three male poodles . The matting ranges from small and pendulous, mostly 
around the chest and neck area, to medium sized matting diffused on the hind legs and flank area. Matted hair can cause 
discomfort and possible skin problems. The licensee should review the facilities program of veterinary care as to how to 
maintain and ensure healthy and unmatted hair coats. 
To be corrected by: 10.4.2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Licensee. 
 
 n
